scripts.configure-gloc: cd ./node_modules/react-native && scripts/ios-install-third-party.sh && cd third-party && cd $(ls | grep 'glog' | awk '{print $1}') && ./configure

scriptsComments.update-imagemagick: Updates ImageMagick to use the right command
scriptsComments.configure-gloc: For iOS dev builds, fixes a build issue
scriptsComments.install-third-party: React native script for iOS deps
scriptsComments.compile: Compile .tsx / .ts to .js. Run each time any typescript changes have been made to ensure changes are compiled
scriptsComments.set-native-variables: Sets variables such as AppId, ContractId, .p12 file details to their native counterparts. Run this whenever any of the app constants have changed to enable them to be pushed to the native resources
scriptsComments.set-native-assets-android: Copies .p12 assets to the native Android project
scriptsComments.set-native-assets-ios: Copies .p12 assets to the native iOS project
scriptsComments.set-native-icons: Generate platform specifc icons for both Android and iOS.
scriptsComments.create-ios-bundle: Creates the native bundle used by React Native
scriptsComments.create-android-bundle: Creates the native bundle used by React Native
scriptsComments.run-ios: Run iOS build, doesn't recompile resources
scriptsComments.run-android: Run Android build, doesn't recompile resources
scriptsComments.compile-run-android: Compiles code and run Android build
scriptsComments.compile-run-ios: Compiles code and run iOS build
scriptsComments.clean: Removes compiled js and bundled files
scriptsComments.clean-assets: Removes copied .p12 assets from the native resources
scriptsComments.lint: Runs linting on the typescript codebase
scriptsComments.lint-fix: Runs and tries to fix the linting issues on the typescript codebase
